entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

Yeni bir inan√ß ortaya √ßƒ±ktƒ± ve bunu yaymak i√ßin sen se√ßildin. ƒ∞nsanlƒ±ƒüƒ±n senden ve s√∂zlerinden nefret etmek i√ßin hep bir sebebi olacak, yapman gereken s√∂zlerin, mucizelerin kullanmak ve inancƒ±n √ºzerinde yaptƒ±ƒüƒ±n geli≈ütirmelerin ile dinini t√ºm d√ºnyaya inandƒ±rmak. Nefretlerini kazanmadan insanlar ile konu≈ümalƒ±, ≈üehirleri gezmeli ve mucizelerin ile yanlƒ±≈ülarƒ± d√ºzeltmelisin. Mƒ±sƒ±r, Kud√ºs ya da Roma'dan ba≈ülayacaƒüƒ±n seyahatinde y√ºzlerce hikaye ve ki≈üi ile kar≈üƒ±la≈üacak, inancƒ±nƒ± t√ºm d√ºnyaya yaymaya √ßalƒ±≈üƒ±rken yirmi farklƒ± sondan birine ula≈üacaksƒ±n. Ser√ºvenin boyunca daha fazla inanana ula≈ümak i√ßin dinini, mucizeler ve felaketler yapabilmek i√ßin kendini geli≈ütirebilirsin. S√∂zlerinin etkileri d√ºnyada kaos yaratƒ±rken, sen insanlarƒ±n nefreti, yalanlar, krallar ve iblisler ile uƒüra≈üarak t√ºm insanlƒ±ƒüƒ±n inandƒ±ƒüƒ± bir din yaratmalƒ±sƒ±n. Yasal Bilgilendirme; Bu oyun i√ßerisinde, ger√ßekte var olan herhangi bir inan√ß ile ilgili hi√ß bir olay, ki≈üi, hikaye ve kelime kullanƒ±lmamƒ±≈ütƒ±r. Oyun i√ßerisinde anlatƒ±lan hikaye eski bir d√∂nemde ge√ßtiƒüi i√ßin tarihi devlet sƒ±nƒ±rlarƒ± √ºzerinden hayali bir harita olu≈üturulmu≈ütur. Bu oyun i√ßerisinde yer alan karakterler, olaylar, hikayeler ve kelimelerin tamamƒ± hayal √ºr√ºn√ºd√ºr ve ger√ßeƒüi yansƒ±tmamaktadƒ±r.

entry.title: Overwinter Survival
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫2,99 [‚Ç∫2,99 ~ ‚Ç∫9,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫2,99

In-App Purchases

  • Standard PackÔºö‚Ç∫4,99
  • Elite PackÔºö‚Ç∫59,99
  • Advanced PackÔºö‚Ç∫19,99
  • Premium PackÔºö‚Ç∫34,99

Application Description

Overwinter Survival is a card-based survival game in which you are stranded on the glaciers of Greenland. The cold and loneliness ensnare you after your plane breaks down for an unknown reason, leaving you crashed on Greenland's glaciers and seeking shelter at a nearby cabin. Now you must hunt, craft tools and items, and keep your stove fueled to survive in the cold. In Overwinter Survival, you must use the cards you're dealt to stay alive. You can only use one card per round. With Lady Luck at the helm, no two journeys will be the same. Fish in the glaciers, hunt with your spear and craft an axe at your workshop to become a lumberjack. To get out of this frozen hell and see your family once again, you must stay alive and repair your plane. Experience a unique journey each time you play with randomly generated card decks and test your survival skills while pushing your luck amidst the frozen glaciers.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Bir ba≈ükan olarak, iktidarƒ±nƒ± kaybetmemek i√ßin vurdumduymaz, ho≈üg√∂r√ºl√º, acƒ±masƒ±z ya da sevgi dolu kararlar vermen gerekecek, bir sonraki kararƒ±nƒ±n sonu√ßlarƒ±nƒ± iyi d√º≈ü√ºnerek, se√ßimlerini buna g√∂re yapmalƒ± ve iktidarda kaldƒ±ƒüƒ±n s√ºreyi uzatmalƒ±sƒ±n, ba≈ükanlƒ±ƒüƒ±n boyunca ittifaklar, hainler ve hatta gizemli misafirler ile uƒüra≈üacak ve pek √ßok farklƒ± sona ula≈üacaksƒ±n!

Tahtta olduƒüun s√ºrede herkesin senden istekleri olacak, her se√ßim devletinin ba≈üka bir g√ºc√ºn√º etkileyecek, tahtƒ± kaybetmemek i√ßin dengeyi korumalƒ±sƒ±n! Tahtƒ±nƒ±n yanƒ±nda topraklarƒ±nƒ± korumak i√ßinde kararlar vermen gerekecek, ƒ∞stanbul'un Fethi, Termopylae Muharebesi, Niƒübolu Muharebesi, Deligrad Sava≈üƒ± ve Ala≈üehir Ku≈üatmasƒ± gibi tarihten ger√ßek sava≈ülarƒ±n taktiklerinin basitle≈ütirilmi≈ü halleri ile bir komutan olarak h√ºk√ºmler vererek fetihler yapacaksƒ±n. Application Description

Prepare for battle - a mob of heroes is about to invade your territory! Build traps facilities in your dungeon, hire monsters, discover relics with mysterious power, and protect your dungeon from heroes that came to take you down. ‚óÜ CONTENTS - 9 Dark Lords with special skills! - 300+ monsters and heroes - 100+ traps and facilities for your dungeon - 200+ relics with mysterious power - Various EVENTS filled with surprises - Various elements that can be unlocked throughout gameplay - and more‚Ä¶! We are planning to add more Dark Lords, traps, monsters, and more game modes! ‚óÜ CREATE YOUR OWN DUNGEON Think carefully when placing traps, facilities, and monsters into your dungeon. Strong strategy will help you survive the swarm of heroes and allow you to unlock more elements for your dungeon. May your dungeon endure the bravest heroes there are! ‚óÜ EXPLORE YOUR FATE Choose your fate from a selection of fate cards every day. If you wish to battle, heroes will come, and if you wish for surprises, a special event will take place. Choose the fate you want as the master of your dungeon. -SUPPORT- E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com Tel :+82 10-4178-0283
